properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where (ProcessCommandLine contains "REGSVR " and ProcessCommandLine contains ".dll") and (FolderPath endswith "\\odbcconf.exe" or ProcessVersionInfoOriginalFileName =~ "odbcconf.exe")

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects execution of "odbcconf" with "REGSVR" in order to register a new DLL (equivalent to running regsvr32). Attackers abuse this to install and run malicious DLLs.
